name: Paintball Panic!
description:
Shoot balls of paint (not *really* paintballs) to dye the world! er, screen. Paintballs are very dangerous though, and by firing them off you put yourself in danger. Use your bullet hell skills and the deflect ability to avoid n early demise at your own hands!

LMB / SPACE: Shoot

RMB / LSHIFT: Deflect

Submission for MiniJam 111.
